|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is a hardware external RAID device. It has USB 2.0, Firewire 800 (x2), and eSATA interfaces.
There may be varying capacities / included HDDs for this enclosure.
"OX936DS", "+SW3080", "RAID-MINI", "v2.0", and "2009-05-15" is silkscreened on one unit's board. :The fan in use is a '''Y.S. Tech''' YD124010LB (brushless, 12V 0.04A).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
